sourcesContent:
import { FaPencilAlt, FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa'; import "../index.css" const Task = ({ task, onDelete, onEdit }) => { return (

Task Name: {task.text}

Date of Completion: {task.day}

onDelete(task.id)} className="delIcon" />

onEdit(task.id)} className="editIcon" />

) } export default Task
